scripts.re-build: find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && turbo run build
scripts.dev: pnpm run re-build && turbo run dev --parallel
scripts.clean: find . -name 'node_modules' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.esbuild' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name 'dist' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -prune -exec rm -rf '{}' + && rm -f pnpm-lock.yaml
